text: It's September 2023 and this is still such an epic song, and it always will be. It's also my favorite music soundtrack to any movie EVER. The movie theater experience of watching this film is stellar and magical because of the total combination of the music and the performances and the story itself and I cannot imagine it feeling the same watching it and hearing it on a regular home television and sound system, so I haven't watched it again since seeing it in the theater. I wish it would come back to the big screen again because it just wasn't in theaters long enough and I wanted to see it at least 2 or 3 more times. There's no other film I've enjoyed in a movie theater anywhere near as much as this!

text: This is the very best version of Shallow for me. There is no version more natural than this one. The emotions come across so authentically through the language, the gestures, and the emotions portrayed that it seems tangible to everyone. Lady Gaga on piano is the icing on the cake for this song. This is uniquely beautiful for me. It is simply one of the most beautiful duets of all time and has no equal. Lady Gaga's powerful voice blows me away again every time. This increase in tempo is unique. I love this song and will listen to it again and again and especially watch it, in this version.

text:
Recuerdo claramente este momento de mi vida… mi mami (en paz descanse) no hablaba inglés y realmente siempre evitaba canciones, películas o series en inglés, simplemente por que no le eran de su agrado, pero en esa entrega de Oscares le pedí que si me acompañaba a verla y llegó este momento… mi mami se quedo callada y apreció la canción totalmente, al final solo volteó a verme y me dijo… “que hermosa canción y que hermoso momento acabamos de ver y ella se ve bellísima, que bárbara, quién es?” A lo que solo sonreí y le dije “Lady Gaga mami”… creo que desde ese instante me volví fan de Gaga 🥰

Estas son las maravillas de Dios, porque el dolor queda atrás y El lo cubre con bellos momentos.
author: Daniel Buentello

text: Wow !!!!! This movie and the songs are just Phenomenal, Bradley you need to make another movie and don't leave anything out, I am so speechless, What can I say that hasn't already been said!! You are about the most talented man that there's nothing you can't do, And Stephanie  wow she blowed me away. I have been watching this movie everyday. I'm just so amazed by everything,  Its just one that I can't get enough of. I suppose its because It hits home for me, Such a very beautiful and powerful movie, Its so real and y'all played each part like the way real life is . And you don't see something like this in a movie. Especially in every way and every category, So Bradley you need to make another one and still use Stephanie and if course  Sam Elliott  my dream man❤ I don't know if you and Stephanie were in a relationship or not but the Chemistry y'all had was phenomenal, Just like the movie, Loved it and Love you guys. Y'all are the greatest ❤🌹 And the Oscar goes to Bradley, Stephanie and Sam Elliott 🏆🏆🏆❤❤❤🌹🌹🌹 And the next one please don't make a tragedy at the ending. 😢  I've got to where I don't watch the ending of the movie. I  cry enough. 😢😢😢Just such one of the greatest movies of all time..Thank you for sharing such a beautiful yet tragedy movie. Which you gave us real and realistic is what we got. Love you.
